effect.sword_shield: Inflicts regular damage, then (if successful) sets light screen on the user’s side of the field.
effect.the_isle_of_armor: Inflicts regular damage, then (if successful) sets light screen on the user’s side of the field.

effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: Inflicts regular damage, then (if successful) sets light screen on the user’s side of the field.
effect.legends_arceus: Inflicts regular damage, then (if successful) sets light screen on the user’s side of the field.

short_effect.sword_shield: Sets Light Screen on the user’s side of the field after inflicting damage.
short_effect.the_isle_of_armor: Sets Light Screen on the user’s side of the field after inflicting damage.
short_effect.the_crown_tundra: Sets Light Screen on the user’s side of the field after inflicting damage.
short_effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: Sets Light Screen on the user’s side of the field after inflicting damage.
short_effect.legends_arceus: Sets Light Screen on the user’s side of the field after inflicting damage.

flavor_text.sword_shield: The user unleashes a strong beam from its core. This move deals twice the damage if the target is Dynamaxed.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: The user unleashes a strong beam from its core. This move deals twice the damage if the target is Dynamaxed.
